title: Stock market is starting to ‘show signs of cracking and bursting’: Harvard lecturer - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market is starting to ‘show signs of cracking and bursting’: Harvard lecturer  Yahoo Finance
description: The explosive growth in passive trading, a fear of missing out, and a blind faith in ‘celebrity CEOs’ have contributed to froth in high growth tech names, according to Harvard lecturer and renowned writer Vikram Mansharamani.
